scripts.install:clean: rm -rf node_modules/ && rm -rf yarn.lock && yarn install
scripts.install:ios:clean: cd ios && rm -rf Pods/ Podfile.lock && pod install --repo-update && cd ..
scripts.install:all: yarn install && cd ios && pod install && cd ..
scripts.install:all:update: yarn install && cd ios && pod install --repo-update && cd ..
scripts.ios:uat: yarn watchman; react-native run-ios --mode Uat --scheme "SomeApp-UAT" simulator="iPhone 16 Pro"
scripts.ios:archive:uat: yarn prebuild:uat && yarn watchman; sh ./clean_ios.sh && xcodebuild -workspace ./ios/SomeApp.xcworkspace -scheme "SomeApp-UAT" clean archive -archivePath ./output/ios/SomeApp.xcarchive -destination 'generic/platform=iOS'
scripts.ios:archive:staging: yarn prebuild:staging &&  yarn watchman; sh ./clean_ios.sh && xcodebuild -workspace ./ios/SomeApp.xcworkspace -scheme "SomeApp-Staging" clean archive -archivePath ./output/ios/SomeApp.xcarchive -destination 'generic/platform=iOS'
scripts.ios:archive:prod: yarn prebuild:prod &&yarn watchman; sh ./clean_ios.sh && xcodebuild -workspace ./ios/SomeApp.xcworkspace -scheme "SomeApp" clean archive -archivePath ./output/ios/SomeApp.xcarchive -destination 'generic/platform=iOS'
scripts.android:clean: cd android && rm -rf ./.gradle && rm -rf ./build && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && yarn watchman
scripts.android:uat: ENVFILE=.env.uat yarn android:clean && npx react-native run-android --mode=devDebug --appId 'com.someapp.uat'
scripts.android:staging: ENVFILE=.env.staging yarn android:clean && npx react-native run-android --mode=stagingDebug --appId 'com.someapp.staging'
scripts.android:prod: ENVFILE=.env.prod yarn android:clean && npx react-native run-android --mode=productDebug --appId 'vn.ssv.someapp'
scripts.android:bundle: mkdir -p android/app/src/main/assets && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --minify --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.android:build: yarn prebuild:uat && ENVFILE=.env.uat && yarn android:bundle && yarn android:clean &&  cd android && ./gradlew clean app:assembledevRelease && cd .. && mkdir -p output/android && cp -f android/app/build/outputs/apk/dev/release/*.apk ./output/android/
scripts.android:build:staging: yarn prebuild:staging && ENVFILE=.env.staging && yarn android:bundle && yarn android:clean &&  cd android && ./gradlew clean app:assemblestagingRelease && cd .. && mkdir -p output/android && cp -f android/app/build/outputs/apk/staging/release/*.apk ./output/android/
scripts.android:build:release: yarn prebuild:prod && ENVFILE=.env.prod && yarn android:bundle && yarn android:clean &&  cd android && ./gradlew clean app:assembleproductRelease && cd .. && mkdir -p output/android && cp -f android/app/build/outputs/apk/product/release/*.apk ./output/android/
scripts.android:build:bundle: yarn prebuild:prod && ENVFILE=.env.prod && yarn android:bundle && yarn android:clean &&  cd android && ./gradlew clean bundleproductRelease && cd .. && mkdir -p output/android && cp -f android/app/build/outputs/bundle/productRelease/*.aab ./output/android/
scripts.testfairy_auto:build:all:android: yarn run tsc && yarn android:build && yarn testfairy_android
scripts.testfairy_auto:build:all:ios: yarn run tsc && yarn ios:archive:uat && yarn ios:export:adhoc && yarn testfairy_ios
